basic.blooming: Flowering period March-October, fruiting period August-December
basic.color: Flower color light green, golden yellow, fruit color dark brown

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, grows in sunny places, slight shade tolerance
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 2-3 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead, rotten, diseased leaves and the parts that may affect the good appearance
